# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(basicSample LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(basicSample "")
set_target_properties(basicSample PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "basicSample")
set_target_properties(basicSample PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
target_include_directories(basicSample PRIVATE
    .
)
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET basicSample PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_sources(basicSample PRIVATE
    samples/basicSample.cpp
)

# target
add_executable(fullSample "")
set_target_properties(fullSample PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "fullSample")
set_target_properties(fullSample PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
target_include_directories(fullSample PRIVATE
    .
)
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET fullSample PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_sources(fullSample PRIVATE
    samples/fullSample.cpp
)

# target
add_executable(globSample "")
set_target_properties(globSample PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "globSample")
set_target_properties(globSample PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
target_include_directories(globSample PRIVATE
    .
)
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET globSample PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_sources(globSample PRIVATE
    samples/globSample.cpp
)
